participant_1.background:
I used my artistic skills to teach children how to create beautiful and creative works of art.
I don't have a specific exercise routine, but I try to get some activity in most days of the week.
i m also a fulltime student studying radiology at local college.
i ve never been to the beach.
I play in a band that my parents don't know about.

participant_2.background:
I listen to the Beatles every morning before work to start my day off on the right foot.
i love cooking.
i am allergic to milk.
I practice yoga and meditation to keep fit and calm my mind.
I can't wait to get home and tend to my greenhouse after the concert tonight.

content.text: Hey there. What do you do for work?
I am a chef at a local restaurant. How about you?
I am a full time student and I teach art classes to kids. I also play in a band, but my parents don't know about it.
Wow, that's cool! I love art. I love to cook and I also practice yoga and meditation to keep fit and calm my mind.
That's great! I wish I could do yoga and meditation. I am not very flexible.
It's never too late to start! I started when I was in my 30s.
I know, I know. I should really try it. I am allergic to milk, so I can't have a lot of the foods that I love to cook.
Oh, that's too bad. I love milk! I listen to the Beatles every morning before work to start my day off on the right foot.
That's so cool! I love the Beatles too. I actually have a band, but my parents don't know about it.
Wow, that's awesome! I would love to hear you play sometime.
Yeah, maybe I can bring you to one of our concerts.
That would be great! I can't wait to see what you do.
